extension.description: Download and install add-ons from the Pivos addon repository.[CR] These addons are pulled from the official XBMC.org repository and hosted by Pivos to ease the burden on XBMC's mirrors. By using this repository you will be able to take advantage of our fast Content Delivery Network to help get you faster downloads from a region close to you.[CR]
